title: Brightest Day - Complete + 12 Tie-Ins by Ridge87701
description:
This torrent contains the entire Brightest Day Saga - Issues 00 till 24 plus 12 Tie-Ins

Brightest Day Tie-In - 01 - Green Lantern (v4) 053.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 02 - Green Lantern Corps (v2) 047.cbz
Brightest Day Tie-In - 03 - The Flash (v5) 01.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 04 - Justice League of America 044.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 05 - Justice League - Generation Lost 01.cbz
Brightest Day Tie-In - 06 - Justice League - Generation Lost 02.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 07 - Green Lantern (v4) 054.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 08 - Green Lantern Corps (v2) 048.cbr
Brightest Day Tie-In - 09 - The Flash (v5) 02.cbz
Brightest Day Tie-In - 10 - Justice League of America 045.cbz
Brightest Day Tie-In - 11 - Titans - Villains For Hire 01.cbz
Brightest Day Tie-In - 12 - Birds of Prey (v2) 01.cbz

This is by no means complete, but sadly I couldn't find any decent reading order for the Brightest Day Tie-Ins, so if anyone has the reading order, please mail it to me, and I will compile and upload a new torrent.
Until then, enjoy the Brightest Day!

Cheers,

Ridge
